<div class="esv"><h2>Genesis 15</h2>
<div class="esv-text"><h3 id="p01015001.01-1">God's Covenant with Abram</h3>
<p id="p01015001.05-1"><span class="chapter-num" id="v01015001-1">15:1&nbsp;</span>After these things the word of the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span> came to Abram in a vision: &#8220;Fear not, Abram, I am your shield; your reward shall be very great.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015002-1">2&nbsp;</span>But Abram said, &#8220;O Lord <span class="small-caps">God</span>, what will you give me, for I continue<span class="footnote">&nbsp;<a href="#f1" id="b1" title="Or 'I shall die'">[1]</a></span> childless, and the heir of my house is Eliezer of Damascus?&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015003-1">3&nbsp;</span>And Abram said, &#8220;Behold, you have given me no offspring, and a member of my household will be my heir.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015004-1">4&nbsp;</span>And behold, the word of the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span> came to him: &#8220;This man shall not be your heir; your very own son<span class="footnote">&nbsp;<a href="#f2" id="b2" title="Hebrew 'what will come out of your own loins'">[2]</a></span> shall be your heir.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015005-1">5&nbsp;</span>And he brought him outside and said, &#8220;Look toward heaven, and number the stars, if you are able to number them.&#8221; Then he said to him, &#8220;So shall your offspring be.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015006-1">6&nbsp;</span>And he believed the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span>, and he counted it to him as righteousness.</p>
 <p id="p01015007.01-1"><span class="verse-num" id="v01015007-1">7&nbsp;</span>And he said to him, &#8220;I am the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span> who brought you out from Ur of the Chaldeans to give you this land to possess.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015008-1">8&nbsp;</span>But he said, &#8220;O Lord <span class="small-caps">God</span>, how am I to know that I shall possess it?&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015009-1">9&nbsp;</span>He said to him, &#8220;Bring me a heifer three years old, a female goat three years old, a ram three years old, a turtledove, and a young pigeon.&#8221; <span class="verse-num" id="v01015010-1">10&nbsp;</span>And he brought him all these, cut them in half, and laid each half over against the other. But he did not cut the birds in half. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015011-1">11&nbsp;</span>And when birds of prey came down on the carcasses, Abram drove them away.</p>
 <p id="p01015012.01-1"><span class="verse-num" id="v01015012-1">12&nbsp;</span>As the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell on Abram. And behold, dreadful and great darkness fell upon him. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015013-1">13&nbsp;</span>Then the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span> said to Abram, &#8220;Know for certain that your offspring will be sojourners in a land that is not theirs and will be servants there, and they will be afflicted for four hundred years. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015014-1">14&nbsp;</span>But I will bring judgment on the nation that they serve, and afterward they shall come out with great possessions. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015015-1">15&nbsp;</span>As for yourself, you shall go to your fathers in peace; you shall be buried in a good old age. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015016-1">16&nbsp;</span>And they shall come back here in the fourth generation, for the iniquity of the Amorites is not yet complete.&#8221;</p>
 <p id="p01015017.01-1"><span class="verse-num" id="v01015017-1">17&nbsp;</span>When the sun had gone down and it was dark, behold, a smoking fire pot and a flaming torch passed between these pieces. <span class="verse-num" id="v01015018-1">18&nbsp;</span>On that day the <span class="small-caps">Lord</span> made a covenant with Abram, saying, &#8220;To your offspring I give<span class="footnote">&nbsp;<a href="#f3" id="b3" title="Or 'have given'">[3]</a></span> this land, from the river of Egypt to the great river, the river Euphrates, <span class="verse-num" id="v01015019-1">19&nbsp;</span>the land of the Kenites, the Kenizzites, the Kadmonites, <span class="verse-num" id="v01015020-1">20&nbsp;</span>the Hittites, the Perizzites, the Rephaim, <span class="verse-num" id="v01015021-1">21&nbsp;</span>the Amorites, the Canaanites, the Girgashites and the Jebusites.&#8221;</p>
</div>
